Coldness_SamiRouge.NAME: Cold
Coldness_SamiRouge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust  . NL When this card is in your hand, you can't play Skill .
Coldness_SamiRouge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When Exhausted , returned to your hand . NL When this card is in your hand, you can't play Skill .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: It's so cold……

Hypothermia_SamiRouge.NAME: Hypothermia
Hypothermia_SamiRouge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust  . NL When this card is in your hand, you can't play Attack .
Hypothermia_SamiRouge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When Exhausted, returned to your hand. NL When this card is in your hand, you can't play Attack .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I almost can't feel my limbs……

Freeze_SamiRouge.NAME: Freeze
Freeze_SamiRouge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust  . NL When this card is in your hand, you can't play other cards except Freeze .
Freeze_SamiRouge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When Exhausted, returned to your hand . NL When this card is in your hand, you can't play other cards except Freeze.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I……can't move……

ActivateMatrix_SamiRouge.NAME: Activate the Matrix
ActivateMatrix_SamiRouge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust  . NL Let the Mapping between Virtuality and Reality of all enemies lose effect , until you play other !M! cards.

RelicPreviewCard_SamiRouge.NAME: Relic Name
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The effect of this relic
The Flavor of this relic

PastWeaveFuture_SamiRouge.NAME: Past Weave With Future
PastWeaveFuture_SamiRouge.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust  . NL Mark 1 card in your hand as samirg:Eternal .
PastWeaveFuture_SamiRouge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain , Exhaust  . NL Mark 1 card in your hand as samirg:Eternal .

samirg:C01.NAME: Outcast
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Realm-weight the guilt, ruined of pardon; never now to meet again.

samirg:C02.NAME: Hunter
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Bow traps shadow, shrieking in wind; knows the hunt no end.

samirg:C03.NAME: Warrior
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Firm beeth rock, rising in ranges; horned the helmet in hoar.

samirg:C04.NAME: Shaman
samirg:C04.DESCRIPTION: *Layout NL X=1 NL If the stage you are in is not less than 3, NL X=2
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Speak in sage tongues, secret the cipher; call to banish the bale.

samirg:C05.NAME: Snowpriest
samirg:C05.DESCRIPTION: *Layout NL X=2 NL If you are in Secluded Passage, NL X=3
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Espy the realm, every life seen; seek your sojourn path.

samirg:C06.NAME: Hero
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Sprawl do thorns, throttling bones; death is a dale of return.

samirg:C07.NAME: Canopy
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Lush grow the limbs, leaves all about; here do hundred-beasts dwell.

samirg:C08.NAME: Water
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Cleansed in slush, skin and hair; placid lies the lake.

samirg:C09.NAME: Eye
samirg:C09.DESCRIPTION: *Layout NL X=1 NL If you don't have any other Layout taking effect now, NL X=3
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Seen and known, sought and bid; there to gloaming gone.

samirg:C10.NAME: Arch
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Hornbeast tracks, training of bells; vague 'til passing's place.

samirg:C11.NAME: Light
samirg:C11.DESCRIPTION: *Layout NL X=2 NL If you use this Foldartals out of the battle, NL X=3
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Stands the torch, certain as daylight; challenges chilblain eve.

samirg:C12.NAME: Earth
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Rise every being, return eft to roots; hewn is All from here.

samirg:C13.NAME: Originium
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: All mud and flesh, failing welcome; all image in all midst.

samirg:C14.NAME: Tree
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Sail there high, star apparent; see the frost unfold below.

samirg:C15.NAME: Stone
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Barren of life, bare of a shift; silent sits antiquity.

samirg:C16.NAME: Shrub
samirg:C16.DESCRIPTION: *Layout . NL For each node succeeds to the current node, X+1
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Prone do you slink, prowler and beast; there you hear the horn.

samirg:C17.NAME: Beast
samirg:C17.DESCRIPTION: *Layout NL X=2 NL If trigger the Concord , NL X=3
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gnaw upon soil, steal fruits of rime; move as may you wish.

samirg:C18.NAME: Human
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Animate wisdom, willed to the young; down the ages tie the days.

samirg:C19.NAME: Advent
samirg:C19.DESCRIPTION: *Layout NL X=1 NL Trigger the Concord
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Cross mount and stream, snows thus traversed; fate's choice fixed in stone.

samirg:C20.NAME: Departure
samirg:C20.DESCRIPTION: *Layout NL X=2 NL Trigger the Concord
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Far lies the sound, sight flung in distance; unknowns yet unknown.

samirg:C21.NAME: Scar
samirg:C21.DESCRIPTION: *Layout NL Can only be paired with *Void .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Cataclysm courses land, souls of travelers stirred thick

samirg:C22.NAME: Sing
samirg:C22.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL At the start of next X combat, gain 3 Strength . NL *When *declared *in *the *combat: take effect at once.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Incants string-song, echoing round; in forest all feathers alight.
Gain 1 additional #yRitual .
At the start of next #b
combats, gain 3 #yStrength .
combats, gain 3 #yStrength and 1 #yRitual .

samirg:C23.NAME: Silence
samirg:C23.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL At the start of next X combat, increase your Max HP by 50% until the end of the combat. NL *When *declared *in *the *combat: take effect at once.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Heed the trees' way, hearken no answer; still are mountains stood.
Additionally summon a #yShieldguard .
At the start of next #b
combats, increase your Max HP by 50% until the end of the combat.
combats, increase your Max HP by 50% until the end of the combat, and summon a #yShieldguard .

samirg:C24.NAME: Recite
samirg:C24.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL At the end of next X combat, heal 6 HP. As for the Bosses and Elites, heal 12 HP instead.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Speak the old kennings, pray to your kin; weave the mind of word.
Additioanally gain 3 Max HP. As for the Bosses and Elites, gain 6 instead.
At the end of next #b
combats, heal 6 HP. As for the Bosses and Elites, heal 12 HP instead.
combats, heal 6 HP and gain 3 Max HP. As for the Bosses and Elites, heal 12 HP and gain 6 Max HP instead.

samirg:C25.NAME: Debate
samirg:C25.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL At the start of next X combat, draw 2 cards and gain [E] [E] . NL *When *declared *in *the *combat: take effect at once.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Cease does your singing, self do I show; thought meets truth intact.
Obtain #yMedical #yKit until the end of combat.
At the start of next #b
combats, draw 2 cards and gain [E] [E] .
combats, draw 2 cards and gain [E] [E] . Obtain #yMedical #yKit until the end of combat.

samirg:C26.NAME: Console
samirg:C26.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL At the end of next X combat, drop an additional card reward.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Drum-beat and leaf-fire, long-lost souls hail!; whispers wean from grief.
Drop 2 additional card rewards instead.
At the end of next #b
combats, drop an additional card reward.
combats, drop 2 additional card rewards.

samirg:C27.NAME: Confess
samirg:C27.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL At the end of next X combat, heal 4 HP. As for the Elites or Bosses, drop an additional relic.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Lone with the Tree, talk of remorse; fellow pleads fellow forgive.
Drop 2 additional relics instead.
At the end of next #b
combats, heal 4 HP. As for the Elites or Bosses, drop an additional relic.
combats, heal 4 HP. As for the Elites or Bosses, drop 2 additional relics.

samirg:C28.NAME: Cry
samirg:C28.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL Heal 6 HP for X times at once.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Cry mournful lay, cold heavens shake; from lone trunk does forest bloom.
Gain 6 Max HP additionally.

samirg:C29.NAME: Delight
samirg:C29.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL At the end of next X combat, gain 80 Gold.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Rainbow floats moonshade, rests in its jar; here now wish as you will.
Gain additional 40 Gold .
At the end of next #b
combats, gain 80 Gold.
combats, gain 120 Gold.

samirg:C30.NAME: Surprise
samirg:C30.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL Until the end of next X combats, gain 50% discount on all prodcuts.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Amid custom strange, bestowed is a gift; waver well then unite.
Gain 75% discount on rare product instead.
At the end of next #b
combats, gain 50% discount on all prodcuts.
combats, gain 50% discount on all prodcuts. As fo rare products gain 75% discount on them instead.

samirg:C31.NAME: Rage
samirg:C31.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL At the end of next X combat, drop 1 common relic.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Ice and rock's havoc, hammer cast down; feather cannot dare crow.
Drop a uncommon relic instead.
At the end of next #b
combats , drop 1 common relic.
combats , drop 1 uncommon relic.

samirg:C32.NAME: Doubt
samirg:C32.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL For the next X times you exchange in *Lost *and *Found , you will have an additional chance for free exchange.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Straight path warped, where do you lead?; not a tree does know.
Remove 1 random Paradigm after you exchange.
For the next #b
times you exchange in #yLost #yand #yFound , you will have an additional chance for free exchange.
times you exchange in #yLost #yand #yFound , you will have an additional chance for free exchange and remove 1 random Paradigm.

samirg:C33.NAME: Anticipate
samirg:C33.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL At the start of next X turns, double your Energy and draw cards until your hand is full.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Mind awander, where in life's dream; glimpsed in blizzard bare.
Gain temp Dexterity equals to your #yAnti-Interference #yIndex and gain temp Strength equals to your #ySingular #yMatrix .
At the start of next #b
turns, double your Energy and draw cards until your hand is full.
turns, double your Energy and draw cards until your hand is full. Gain temp Dexterity equals to your #yAnti-Interference #yIndex and gain temp Strength equals to your #ySingular #yMatrix .

samirg:C34.NAME: Love
samirg:C34.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL The next X ? room is Treasure room. Won't take effect in Secluded Passage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Boundless the tundra, be by my body; fire be my heart aflame
Obtain 1 common relic at once.
The next #b
? room is Treasure room. Won't take effect in Secluded Passage.
? room is Treasure room. Won't take effect in Secluded Passage.

samirg:C35.NAME: Satisfy
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Stores flush with hunger-guard, slaked is your thirst; naught more need ask..
Gain 80 Gold X times instead.

samirg:C36.NAME: Patrol
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Trees scaled at day, twilight in lookout; kept is earth by fire of kin.
While remove 1 #ySingular #yMatrix .

samirg:C37.NAME: Nest
samirg:C37.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL At the start of your next X combats, gian 15 Block . NL *When *declared *in *the *combat: take effect at once.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gather wild timber, tell of shade-shelter; no chill 'neath eaves blows.
Obtain #yToolbox at the end of the combat.
At the start of your next #b
combats, gian 15 Block.
combats, gian 15 Block. Obtain #yToolbox at the end of the combat.

samirg:C38.NAME: Hunt
samirg:C38.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL The next X enemy rooms you enter will be changed into Elites rooms *AFTER *SL.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Tusk and claw, time bode well; learn to dare on danger's path.
At the start of these combats, obtain #ySling #yof #yCourage until the end of the combats.
The next #b
enemy rooms you enter will be changed into Elites rooms after SL.
enemy rooms you enter will be changed into Elites rooms after SL. At the start of these combats, obtain #ySling #yof #yCourage until the end of the combats.

samirg:C39.NAME: Plunder
samirg:C39.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL The next X times you move horizontally, gain 50 Gold and heal 4 HP .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Wrest and plunder, righteous not; preordained are dues to pay.
Gain additional 1 #yAnti-Interference #yIndex .
The next #b
times you move horizontally, gain 50 Gold and heal 4 HP .
times you move horizontally, gain 50 Gold and heal 4 HP , and gain additional 1 #yAnti-Interference #yIndex .

samirg:C40.NAME: Reproduce
samirg:C40.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL The next X times you move horizontally, Upgrade 1 random card.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Flora and fauna, flourish and fall; last ye everlong.
This card will played twice when it is played for the first time in every combat.
The next #b
times you move horizontally, Upgrade 1 random card.
times you move horizontally, Upgrade 1 random card, and this card will played twice when it is played for the first time in every combat.

samirg:C41.NAME: Migrate
samirg:C41.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL Change random X node succeeds to the current node into *Bosky *Passage .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Out of snow's forest, far from tribe's tree; yearn you harder yet.
Obtain X #yAnti-Interference #yIndex at once .

samirg:C42.NAME: Respite
samirg:C42.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL You can have X additional chance to act when you enter the Campfire.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Blind and low, lost in dreams; respite from this realm.
When you are excuting your additional act in Campfire, you can #yRemove #ycard or #yDig #yfor #yrelics .
You can act additional #b
times.
times, and you can #yRemove #ycard or #yDig #yfor #yrelics .

samirg:C43.NAME: Void
samirg:C43.DESCRIPTION: *Sources . NL Can only be paired with *Scar .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Realmbound deeds disappear, minds return unto the void
Obtain #yTreescar #yHelm .
